Jin Dong
Joelle Pineau
William L. Hamilton
dcterms:description: CLUTRR is a diagnostic benchmark suite for evaluating the inductive reasoning capabilities of NLU systems. It generates semi-synthetic stories involving kinship relations, requiring models to infer logical rules and generalize systematically.
dcterms:title: CLUTRR
